amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the state of Texas for recovery from the consequences of Hurricane Katrina by $546,100,000.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Paul amendment (A032). Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the amendment stating that it proposed to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
